sentence: My friend told me shes going back to school for psychiatry... i said: thats crazy talk.
explanation: explanation: talk can mean the act of speaking or communication, as well as referring to a conversation or discourse, which can be perceived as nonsensical.

sentence: Why cant melania trump feel her ass? hes away campaigning.

sentence: Have you heard about the worlds largest broom? its sweeping the nation!
